content.question: Let <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of <math alttext="y equals, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x " overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></math> and the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown in the figure above. The <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-coordinates of the two points of intersection of the graphs are <math alttext="x sub 1 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="0 is less than, x sub 1, is less than, x sub 2 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the volume of the solid generated when region <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is revolved about the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals 2 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x, minus 2, close parenthesis, squared, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x, close parenthesis, squared, minus 2 squared, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x, minus 2, close parenthesis, squared, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x, close parenthesis, squared, minus 2 squared, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="pi times the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 10 times e raised to the negative x power, times sine x, minus 2, close parenthesis, squared, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.10: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
